dmca.title: L. Ron Hubbard Library Requests Removal of Usenet Postings
dmca.body:
Dear Google Team:
 
 We are writing on behalf of the L. Ron Hubbard Library, the owner of the copyrights of two music album covers entitled "The Road To Freedom Record Album" and "Mission Earth - The Edgar Winter Album".
 
 There are several postings containing these copyrighted works in the Google usenet archive, which were posted without our client's authorization in violation of United States copyright law.  We request that these postings be deleted.  These postings can be located under the message IDs which are attached below.
 
 I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that the posting of these works was not authorized by my client, any agent of my client, or the law.
 
 I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the L. Ron Hubbard Library in this matter.
 
  We appreciate the courteous and prompt attention that you always give to these matters.  Thank you.
 

Sincerely,
[PRIVATE]
[PRIVATE]@aol.com 
Moxon & Kobrin
[PRIVATE]
[PRIVATE]
Los Angeles, California 90010
Tel: (xxx) xxx-xxxx
Fax: (xxx) xxx-xxxx
  *****
 
<c192339f56e192f7d4b1073488df2771@news.meganetnews.com>
<5054619f6747c311f5e38e436edd22da@news.meganetnews.com>
